class.name: DVThemeChartStyle
class.brief_description: Reusable style block that defines legend, axis, grid, and palette defaults for DVChart-derived controls.
class.description: DVThemeChartStyle encapsulates chart-specific presentation values inside [DVTheme]. By adjusting the properties on this resource you can globally control legend placement, grid visibility, tooltips, and the series color palette across every chart that consumes the theme.

members.member: Controls whether themed charts draw axes by default.
Enables the stock tooltip behavior for charts when connected to the theme.
Stroke width applied to grid lines.
Determines whether charts show a background grid by default.
Default legend placement expressed using [enum DVChart.Position] values.
Fallback palette distributed to new series when the theme manages colors.
Enables value label rendering on themed charts by default.

signal.name: theme_changed
signal.description: Emitted whenever a style property changes so connected components can refresh their visuals.
